en_text:
I'm glad to see
you survived.
jp_text: お前はどうしたいんだ

en_text:
I don't even know
where to begin.
jp_text: 私達のヴァンシップに触らないで

en_text: Everything's in chaos.
jp_text: この船においておくより安全だ
google_translated: It is safer than putting in this ship

en_text:
The only thing we have left
is our fathers' Vanship.
jp_text: どこが世界一安全な場所なのよ
google_translated: Where is the world's largest safe place

en_text:
JUST KEEP ON TRYING,
KEEP ON FLYING.
I WILL BE THE LIGHT.

If we think of the dawn
as one beginning...
jp_text: つの始まりとするなら
google_translated: If it is the beginning of one

en_text:
If we think of right now
as the time to come...
jp_text: 今が来るべき时だとするなら
google_translated: If it is time to come now

en_text:
It's a cloud age symphony
together with you...
jp_text: 君とのCloud Age Symphony　雲の
google_translated: Cloud Age Symphony Cloud with You

en_text:
Oh, can I encounter
a moment...
jp_text: Ah 魔法のような一瞬に会えるのか？
google_translated: AH Magical Can I meet a moment?

en_text:
in exchange for
a cold night,
jp_text: 冷たい夜を引き替えに　二人は　羽ばたいて
google_translated: Two people will fly to the cold night

en_text:
...and grasp hold of eternity
at our journey's end.
jp_text: 永远を掴む、その果てには
google_translated: Grab the Energy, that's the end

en_text: I... I don't want to go.

I need to talk to him, but he won't
so much as give me the time of day.
This is huge!
jp_text: 死にに出てきたような者だね
google_translated: It is a person who came out to death

en_text: I bet she and Claus--
jp_text: やれやれ　ほどいもんだ

en_text:
Not after you checked out
Claus and all...

I feel sorry
for Lavie.

If you wanna make a move,
now's your chance!
jp_text: ここにはもう用はねぇ

en_text: Lavie?
C'mon out.
jp_text: 逃げたに水ハーフハイント

en_text:
That's all
we can do.

I'm working on
our Vanship.
Lavie, I'm waiting, too!
jp_text: 死ぬまで蛭っぽいしてやる
google_translated: I'm going to die until I die

en_text:
Let's go. Lavie needs
a little time.
jp_text: 後方隊27　居住区に敵機侵入
google_translated: Back Corps 27 Invade enemy aircraft in residential areas

en_text:
Idiot... You don't
get it at all.

His Imperial Majesty is most
displeased over the loss...
jp_text: ヴァンシップ隊が何やってんだい

en_text:
...where he will see to cleaning out
the Disith forces that invaded Norkia.
jp_text: 中甲板地下室に　敵機侵入
google_translated: Enemy invaded in the middle shrimp basement

en_text: And the Silvana has been sunk, taking the key to Exile with it.
google_translated: Enemy invasion in the 19 and 26 residential areas

en_text:
I believe it may be premature to conclude
that the key has been lost.
google_translated: The fifth machine can be thrust

en_text: No. It is enough.
Listen!

We will annihilate
the Guild!
google_translated: I will charge the second machine

en_text:
We will start
a war, sire?
'Morning.
jp_text: ラヴィ　出力ダウンして

en_text:
Status report, sir. Repairs are complete to the
point where we are capable of navigation.
Prepare for liftoff!

All hands,
prepare for liftoff!
jp_text: ヘタクソだけど　何だかキラキラしているね
google_translated: Hetaxo, but it is sparkling something

en_text: That's a good girl...
Gunnery ready!

Port spotter, no sign
of enemy activity!

Listening post! No engine sounds
detected in vicinity!
Silvana, lift off!
Begin surfacing!
jp_text: ラヴィ　上昇するよ

en_text:
Yes, Excellency. We've detected
a Claudia reaction.
It is definitely the Silvana.

Who knows
of this?

His Majesty must not be told directly.
Is that clear?
jp_text: ルシオラは手出ししないで

en_text:
To avoid the outbreak of war, I have
no choice but to involve the princess...
jp_text: でもね　僕には時間がないんだ
google_translated: But I have no time for me

en_text:
...but I think that just means
that she gives everything her all.
Lavie.
jp_text: 左後方に敵機　距離1000

en_text:
I want you to make friends
with Tatiana.
Sorry.
Claus, I'm sorry...
Lavie!
What's the matter?

Visibility nominal. No airborne objects
along flight path.
jp_text: プリンシパル　ディーオだ

en_text:
Captain, what is
our course?
jp_text: すこし接近しすぎではありませんか

en_text: Claus...

To return these to Claus,
that's all.
jp_text: あの動き　いい腕だ

en_text: Tatiana.

Hi! How long has it been,
a whole day?
google_translated: I saw it a while ago

en_text: Uh, no...
Yeah, I know.

What, you never
noticed it?
jp_text: まず　一回撃墜だよ
google_translated: First of all, it is shot down once

en_text: He's no fun.

What's this? The old team
is back in action?
google_translated: Enemy machine in the rear solder room

en_text:
Tatiana!
Get a move on!
jp_text: 疲れる任務だったわね　タチアナ
google_translated: It was a tired task Tachiana

en_text: Claus isn't flying today.
Okay, maybe not.
jp_text: まだ任務は終わっていないわ
google_translated: It has not been completed yet

en_text: All Vanships now scrambled.
jp_text: 最大出力　増槽落とせ

en_text:
Why do you have a picture
of our fathers in your quarters?

That man who flew with my dad,
that was you?
I'm a coward.

And you saw
our fathers die?

Yes. I expect that I'll never forget
that sight as long as I live.

She was watching us,
smiling.
jp_text: いや　戦闘を続行する

en_text: Maestro Delphine...
He can't be serious...!

It's what backs up
the Guild's authority.

Power that will
destroy this world.
jp_text: 今度は誰にも邪魔させないからね
google_translated: This time I will not disturb anyone

en_text:
That's why you
fly the skies?

Besides, I just
can't do it...

Think about it. Why are you
aboard this ship?
jp_text: 戦闘中に気絶するようでは 使い物にならない
google_translated: It does not become useful if you are fainting during battle

en_text: Your hair...

I've told Claus everything.
He says he isn't leaving the ship.
jp_text: 艦長が許可されたもので

en_text: Is that so, sir?
jp_text: しかもお前のナビは最低だ
google_translated: Moreover, your navigation is the lowest

en_text: Oh, you did?
Yes, ma'am.

I wonder why Alex
never said anything?

He just stood there, watching me and Lavie
as we suffered on the battlefield.

The Captain has suffered
a great deal, too.

It doesn't seem
that way to me.
I'm sorry.
jp_text: クラウス　ごめんね

en_text:
Nighttime is
fast approaching.
google_translated: The night's time is coming soon

en_text:
You are near,
yet so far away.
What do you admire?
jp_text: でも遠い…何に憧れて だれを想うのか
google_translated: But far ... What is the one who admires?

en_text:
Words catch in my throat
at the sight...
jp_text: 透き通る美しさに 言葉を飲んだ
google_translated: I drank words about the transparent beauty

en_text:
If you are going
to travel the skies,
jp_text: あなたが空を行くなら

en_text:
...I want to become
your wings.
jp_text: わたしは翼になりたい
google_translated: I want to be a wing

en_text:
One day, I promise
that I will have...
jp_text: いつか　きっと持つから

en_text:
...supple wings that
will never snap...
jp_text: けして折れない しなやかな羽

en_text:
...no matter how strong
the wind may be.

Do you have any idea what the survival rate
for musketeers is? A measly 30%!
jp_text: 渋いバリトンボイスのバーテンダーが

en_text:
And this is... the handmade one
I got from Lavie!
jp_text: ホールでは　貴族と素敵な女性達の
google_translated: Noble and nice women in Hall

en_text:
Next time on Last Exile, episode 16.
"Breakthrough."
jp_text: ラストエグザイル　第八話

en_text:
Will you leave the ship
with me?
jp_text: 頑張れ　頑張れ　寝坊すけ
google_translated: Good luck with your hard work
